pages.text:
[Page Title: Private Events - Riviera Theater]

Private Events

Book The Riviera for Your Next Event

Transform our 1930’s art deco setting to fit any style of event. From weddings to team building workshops, we’re here to celebrate alongside you. Have questions? Contact our team through the form below or reach out to our Sales Team directly.

|
sales@charlestonplace.com 843-724-8410. 
"" indicates required fields
* Name * Email * Date of event * MM slash DD slash YYYY Number of people * Select 2 Persons 3 Persons 4 Persons 5 Persons 6 Persons 7 Persons 8 Persons 9 Persons 10 Persons More then 10 Persons Additional comments Submit

Ignite the night. Welcome to The Riviera.

Live Entertainment with Historic Charm
Find a Show

The Riviera is an intimate 600-seat music, arts, and comedy performance venue located in the heart of downtown Charleston at the corner of King and Market Streets.
